satin noun
(PAINT)
[ S or U ] (also satin finish) a type of paint that is slightly shiny when it dries: We used white satin for the woodwork rather than gloss.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth the gloss and satin paints come in pure brilliant white. You will need two contrasting colours of matt emulsion paint and some satin finish interior wood varnish.He used a satin finish on the walls.
